summary: After Close Research i found few missing skill books from Oblivion and added them to game .
descriptionHtml:
After Close Research i found few missing skill books from Oblivion and added them to game .

What Names are of the books and what skill are they related ?
Calcinator Treatise :: Alchemy 
Heavy Armor Repair :: Smiting
Light Armor Repair  :: Smiting
The Warp In The West :: Block
Fighters Guild History, 1st Ed. :: HeavArmor
History of the Fighters Guild :: HeavArmor

Where i can Buy Skill Books ?

Understone Keep :: Calcelmo :: Markarth
Dragonsreach :: Farengar :: Whiterun
The Blue Palace :: Sybille Stentor :: Solitude
Mistveil Keep :: Wylandriah :: Riften
The Frozen Hearth :: Nelacar :: Winterhold
The Arcanaeum :: Urag gro-Shub :: College 


Will Skill Books disappear after reading ?
No .

Does Skill Book Prices are balanced ?
Yes i carried over oblivion price level .

How Many Skill Books Were Missing ?
Total now is 6 .

Can I Read Skill Books ?
Yes you can they all are with text inside :) !

What Type mode is based ?
Esp file .

Will there be a problems with Incompatibility with other mods ?
No it\'s made from scratch . 

Encounter Issues or bugs ?
Report them please .
author: glock9mm

files.name: Oblivion Missing Skill Books 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added Skill Books To Leveled Items
Added Skill Books To Merchants

files.name: Oblivion Missing Skill Books 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Count Amount of Skill Books For Merchants
Removed Preview Images From Archive
